directions: Prepare the gelatin according to package instructions. Stir in the drained pineapple. Allow to set until firm.
When gelatin mixture is firm, fold in whipped topping and pour into graham cracker crust. Refrigerate overnight.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package strawberry flavored Jell-O® mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Creamy Party Pie
